Package kueres.media

Class MediaController

java.lang.Object
kueres.media.MediaController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/media")
public class MediaController
extends java.lang.Object
The MediaController provides all API functions related to media. These functions are: - uploading media - downloading media - deleting media
Since:
Feb 25, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tim Engbrocks, tim.engbrocks@student.kit.edu

    • delete
